summary: Frontend testing completed for gender-inclusive labels feature. All 6 features verified successfully through Playwright UI tests.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gender-inclusive labels feature fully implemented and verified. All role labels now include (a) suffix for gender indication.

3_dashboard_quick_access.description: Dashboard quick access buttons show 'Alunos(as)' and 'Servidores(as)'
3_dashboard_quick_access.evidence: Screenshot 02_dashboard_quick_access.png shows both buttons with gender-inclusive labels

4_students_page_title.description: Students page shows 'Alunos(as)' as title and 'Novo(a) Aluno(a)' button
4_students_page_title.evidence: Screenshot 03_students_page.png shows 'Alunos(as)' title and 'Novo(a) Aluno(a)' button

5_staff_page_title.description: Staff page shows 'Gestão de Servidores(as)' as title, 'Servidores(as)' tab, and 'Novo(a) Servidor(a)' button
5_staff_page_title.evidence: Screenshot 04_staff_page.png shows all gender-inclusive labels including 'Professor(a)' in cargo column

6_audit_logs_filters.description: Audit Logs page entity filter shows 'Alunos(as)' and 'Servidores(as)' options
6_audit_logs_filters.evidence: Screenshot 07_audit_entity_filter.png shows dropdown with 'Alunos(as)' and 'Servidores(as)' options

7_users_role_labels.description: Users page modal shows all role labels with gender indication
7_users_role_labels.evidence: Screenshot 09_users_modal.png shows Secretário(a), Diretor(a), Coordenador(a), Professor(a), Aluno(a), Responsável(is)

Dashboard.js.roleLabels: Lines 99-109 - All roles have gender indication: Secretário(a), Diretor(a), Coordenador(a), Professor(a), Aluno(a), Responsável(is)
Dashboard.js.quickAccess: Lines 336, 346 - Quick access buttons show 'Alunos(as)' and 'Servidores(as)'

Layout.js.roleLabels: Lines 20-30 - All roles have gender indication

Users.js.roleLabels: Lines 138-147 - All roles have gender indication

staff/constants.js.CARGOS: Lines 3-16 - All cargos have gender indication: Auxiliar Administrativo(a), Coordenador(a), Diretor(a), Mediador(a), Merendeira(o), Professor(a), Secretário(a), Zelador(a)
staff/constants.js.FUNCOES: Lines 49-56 - All functions have gender indication: Professor(a), Diretor(a), Vice-Diretor(a), Coordenador(a), Secretário(a)

screenshots_taken: 01_dashboard.png - Dashboard with Alunos(as) and Servidores(as) cards
04_staff_page.png - Staff page with Gestão de Servidores(as) title
07_audit_entity_filter.png - Entity filter dropdown with Alunos(as) and Servidores(as)
09_users_modal.png - New user modal with all role labels
note_about_filtering_logic: The filtering logic for secretário, diretor, and coordenador to see only students from their linked schools was implemented in Dashboard.js (lines 29-91) and AnalyticsDashboard.jsx (lines 388-403). However, this cannot be visually tested in the preview environment as there are no users with these profiles linked to specific schools. The logic uses userSchoolIds and isSchoolStaff flags to filter data appropriately.
